S

saveFinal(String) - Static method in class tools.Writer
this method is used to write the output of all the songs: it creates a specific file, and write in it.
saveMultipleSong(String, String) - Static method in class tools.Writer
this method is used to write the output of multiple songs, written by the same artist: it creates a specific file, and write in it.
saveSingleSong(Song) - Static method in class tools.Writer
this method is used to write the output of a single song: it creates a specific file, and write in it.
setAuthor(String) - Method in class baseClasses.Song
 
setCounter(int) - Method in class baseClasses.Word
 
setID(int) - Method in class baseClasses.Word
 
setID(ArrayList<Word>) - Static method in class tools.Utility
this method establishes an unique ID to every Word object to highlight it and differentiates from each other.
setTitle(String) - Method in class baseClasses.Song
 
Song - Class in baseClasses
the Song class is one of the two basic classes of the whole project: it contains all the Word objects contained in a specific Song, and provides tools to modify and utilize them.
Song(File) - Constructor for class baseClasses.Song
 
SongByArtist - Class in computation
the SongByArtist class is used to gather all the Song objects which have the same author.
SongByArtist() - Constructor for class computation.SongByArtist
 
songList(ArrayList<Word>) - Static method in class tools.Utility
a Facade method, used to perform all the necessary operations to a Word ArrayList
songSameArtist() - Method in class computation.FinalComputation
this method gathers all the song analyzed during the program's execution, and writes a unique record.
songSameArtist() - Method in class computation.SongByArtist
 
sort(ArrayList<Word>) - Static method in class tools.Utility
this method is used to sort every Word ArrayList: it checks all the objects and orders them by their counter, in descending order.
